overview: Forget the idea of Britain being a land of coy, reserved types – this raunchy trip to Blighty shows a very different kind country to the one you might have been taught about at school. Indeed, these young lads love nothing better than getting down and dirty with any hard dick that cums their way. They might be a different breed, with their text-speak and modern idioms, but trust us when we tell you that they’re big, they’re hard and they’re totally relentless. Has “Gay Britannia” ever looked so fuckin’ hot?!
title: Y Not
